#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
=Windows=

==Pre-Requisites==
  # Install GTK http://www.gtk.org/download-windows.html
    * Extract zip to C:\GTK then add C:\GTK\lib and C:\GTK\bin to PATH
  # Install Python http://www.python.org/download/
    * After installing add installation folder to PATH http://swaroopch.com/notes/Python_en:Installation#DOS_Prompt
  # Install libxslt http://users.skynet.be/sbi/libxml-python/
  # Install Gobject http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/binaries/win32/pygobject/
  # Install PyCairo http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/binaries/win32/pycairo/
  # Install PyGTK http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/binaries/win32/pygtk/
  # Download knittingchartmaker

==Running==

To run simply double-click 'ChartMaker.bat'
